description: President Erdogan "opened the doors" for them to exit, saying his country can no longer host them.
title: Syria war: Turkey says thousands of migrants have crossed to EU
title_page: Syria war: Turkey says thousands of migrants have crossed to EU - BBC News
maintext: "We will not close these doors in the coming period and this will continue. Why? The European Union needs to keep its promises. We don't have to take care of this many refugees, to feed them," he said.
